aboutContent: Based in Vancouver, BC, ITRecruit is an online recruitment platform that connects tech talents with job opportunities. ITRecruit provides an end-to-end solution that supports candidates from testing their suitability to a specific job, experiencing some challenges in IT career path, finding the most suitable job, collecting feedback from the recruiters after interview to explore the relevant courses to upgrade their career.
ITRecruit is an innovative recruitment p: ITRecruit is an innovative recruitment platform to
Provide career suitability test and skil: Provide career suitability test and skill challenges for IT Candidates

A leading IT recruitment service provide: A leading IT recruitment service provider in ASEAN and North America.
